A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Overall\, The Last Jedi was a visually amazing film. But the lack of direction\, or questions answered leaves a hole in my stomach. The clear political agenda Disney has taken on these movies is appalling. Are male leads not allowed to come off as brave and strong without a female lead bringing them down or \"Saving\" them\, or belittling them at every turn. The lack of sense canonically this movie makes with a true fans understanding of star wars is ridiculous. As Han Solo said it in The New Hope Remake TFA\, \"That's not how the force works\".
